Test Name: West Nile Virus (WNV) Antibody, IgG, Serum
Purpose: To detect and quantify West Nile Virus IgG antibodies in serum to aid in diagnosis or immune status assessment.
Container: Red top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: ELISA reader or chemiluminescence immunoassay analyzer (plus standard lab equipment: centrifuge, micropipettes, vortex mixer, incubator)
